content: at age 13 antonio was diagnosed with hodgkin s lymphoma it was a scary journey but he made it through with the love and support of family friends and strangers to be 5 years post-treatment this is for antonio and anyone else that has fought or will fight hodgkin s lymphoma introducing the antonio crochet bucket hat pattern looking to add a dash of style and a whole lot of flair to your wardrobe you ve just stumbled upon the crochet pattern that ll have you turning heads wherever you go say hello to the antonio crochet bucket hat pattern your ticket to crochet paradise what makes this pattern so special ✨ lemon peel stitch magic crafted with love using the delightful lemon peel stitch this hat oozes texture and charm the unique blend of alternating single and double_crochet stitches creates a beautiful bumpy fabric that s both cozy and chic ✨ worsted weight wonder designed to be worked in worsted weight yarn our pattern ensures your hat will have just the right amount of thickness and warmth you ll stay stylish and snug no matter the season ✨ sizes for everyone antonio isn t just a one-size-fits-all deal this pattern comes complete with sizes for children teens and adults yes even adult large everyone in the family can rock this fabulous crochet creation customize your colors choose your favorite yarn shades and make this hat truly yours go classic with neutrals make it pop with bright hues or create a stylish ombré effect with this pattern you re the artist and your hook is your brush easy-to-follow instructions we ve got your back whether you re a seasoned crochet pro or just starting your creative journey our step-by-step beginner-friendly instructions complete with detailed photos and tips will guide you to crochet success what you ll need \- worsted weight yarn color of your choice up to 208 yds / 190 m \- crochet hook size us h/8 - 5 00 mm \- yarn needle \- stitch markers \- a pinch of enthusiasm mandatory sizes child to fit head circumference - 20 \ 50 cm\ crown 5 5 \ 14 cm\ diameter teen to fit head circumference - 21 5 \ 55 cm\ crown 6 25 \ 15 8 cm\ diameter adult to fit head circumference - 22 5 \ 57 cm\ crown 7 \ 18 cm\ diameter adult large to fit head circumference - 24 \ 61 cm\ crown 7 75 \ 19 cm\ diameter come join confidently crochet with creations by courtney https //www facebook com/groups/creationsbycourt on facebook for cals and camaraderie pattern was tested for each size for clarity and instruction © 2023 courtney whitehead you are allowed to utilize this pattern to make physical product to sell online and at markets please give credit to courtney whitehead creations by courtney llc
